message.body: VCU can't hit an outside shot and Burke is really handling vcu def pressure well but the refs aren't doing VCU any favors. UM is getting away with a lot of pushing and fouls on both ends of the floor.
I really hope Mich doesn't disappoint in the next rounds cause they are really playing like they r supposed to be playing.
Damon Stoudamire is an assistant coach at Memphis! How about that.
Why do we look tired or uninterested?
On offense that is. Just careless. Could be blowing cal out right now.
